reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 500/10: PRESCRIBED TIME PERIOD UNDER SECTION 22.23 OF THE CODE
reg_info.reg_name_text: PRESCRIBED TIME PERIOD UNDER SECTION 22.23 OF THE CODE
reg_info.act_under: Regulated Health Professions Act, 1991   Loi de 1991 sur les professions de la santé réglementées

content.content: 1. For the purposes of section 22.23 of the Code, a Council shall take such steps as are within its power to make, amend or revoke regulations and by-laws under the Code and under its health profession Act so that they conform with sections 22.16 to 22.21 of the Code before June 1, 2012. O. Reg. 500/10, s. 1; O. Reg. 465/11, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of section 22.23 of the Code, a Council shall take such steps as are within its power to make, amend or revoke regulations and by-laws under the Code and under its health profession Act so that they conform with sections 22.16 to 22.21 of the Code before June 1, 2012. O. Reg. 500/10, s. 1; O. Reg. 465/11, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 500/10, s. 2; O. Reg. 465/11, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 500/10, s. 2; O. Reg. 465/11, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 500/10, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 500/10, s. 3.
